pageContext.surface: Decoration is a factor independent of form.
pageContext.other: This is a list of 22 flanged axes studied at the national museum in Copenhagen.  There is additional information about the 22 items available in the "Description" box.
pageContext.composition: All the Flanged Axes in the museum so far analysed have proved to be of COPPER, quite free of tin.
